Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Ford Model A Firetruck
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The Ford Model A, produced from 1927 to 1931, was the successor to the Model T and marked a significant advancement in automotive design and technology. It featured a more modern look with improved styling, a more powerful 3.3-liter four-cylinder engine, and enhanced driving comfort.

Consumes a lot of fuel, and is best used for short to medium distances.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
